org.cougaar.planning.servlet
Class BlackboardServletSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.servlet.SimpleServletSupportImpl
      org.cougaar.planning.servlet.BlackboardServletSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleServletSupport
public class BlackboardServletSupport
extends SimpleServletSupportImpl

 This support class offers additional services on top of the
 SimpleServletSupport class, including access to the blackboard,
 config finder, root factory, ldm serves plugin, and scheduler service.
